pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Tools for Applications of Interval Design## RequirementsPython 3.11+## Installation```shpip install interval-tools```Or if you want to use [ObjectID](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/bson-types/#objectid) as a unique identifier in Domain-Driven Design, run```shpip install "interval-tools[objectid]"```## Quickstart```pycon>>> from interval.utils import get_stream_logger>>> import logging>>> formatter = logging.Formatter('%(levelname)s:%(name)s:%(message)s')>>> logger = get_stream_logger('interval', 'INFO', formatter=formatter)>>> logger.info('Readability counts.')INFO:interval:Readability counts.```
